data: {"generalSituation":"A cold front will move across the coast of Guangdong tonight to early tomorrow. Under the influence of the associated intense northeast monsoon and a broad band of clouds, it will be windy and appreciably cooler over the region midweek this week, it will be cold over inland areas. The broad band of clouds is expected to thin out in the latter part of this week. Meanwhile, the northeast monsoon will also moderate progressively, the weather will improve with temperatures rising gradually over southern China. However, it will still be cool in the morning. Under the persistent influence of a replenishment of the dry northeast monsoon, it will be generally fine over southern China early next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251117","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, north force 5 at night, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods at first. Mainly fine and dry during the day.
